de.esoco.ewt.component

Class ListBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.ewt.component.Component
      • de.esoco.ewt.component.Control
        • de.esoco.ewt.component.ListControl
          • de.esoco.ewt.component.ListBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.esoco.lib.property.HasId<java.lang.String>, de.esoco.lib.property.MultiSelection, de.esoco.lib.property.SingleSelection

    public class ListBox
extends ListControl
    A combo box that combines a text field with a list of values. The values can be selected from the list to be displayed and (optionally) edited in the text field.

    Supported event types:

    • ACTION: when the value changes (either because of popup selection or by confirming keyboard input)
    • VALUE_CHANGED: if the contents of the text field is edited

    Supported style flags:

    • READ_ONLY: to prevent text editing (i.e. only list selections will be possible)
